We are located in an excellent location near the airport, transport terminal, clinics and shopping centres. Located in the Fontibon district of Bogotá, Hotel Los Balcones is 8 km from Corferias International Exhibition Center and 11.3 km from Bolivar Square. The property is 12.9 km from El Campin and 14.5 km from Zona Rosa/Zona T.

Hotel Los Balcones offers private rooms with private bathroom and internet. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV.

Attractively situated in the Fontibon district of Bogotá, Hotel Los Balcones is situated 9 km from Corferias International Exhibition Center, 12 km from Bolivar Square and 13 km from El Campin Stadium. All rooms boast a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests.

description.description: Hotel Los Balcones is a comfortable, quiet and inexpensive place to stay at a very close distance to the airport of Bogotá. Our friendly staff at the 24-hour front desk can help with advice about the area and Bogotá in general.
